location.sjis: ボスタフ工房 ディックル村支部

dialogue.sjis: ザックの野郎、ケガが治って 実家から帰ってきたそうそう あちこちで、こけまくって
dialogue.ascii: Zakk, you klutz! As soon as that brat returned from his parents he keeps tripping over EVERYTHING!

dialogue.sjis: いつも通り、キズだらけだって いうじゃねぇか
dialogue.ascii: Man, you should've known by now! The kid is covered head to toe in so many scars!

dialogue.sjis: 今は、プロスバンの工房本部に いるはずだぜ
dialogue.ascii: If you're looking for Zakk, he's currently at the Prosban branch.
